Preparation
/circle6 Explain to the family the reason for transferring the baby to a higher facility. 
/circle6  If possible, transfer the mother with the baby so that she can continue to breastfeed or 
provide expressed breast milk.
/circle6  Y ou or another health care worker should accompany the baby.
